item.name: Reclusive Repulse
entries: A nonsuspecting silver ring that harbors a deep dwelling in vendettas. This ring is invisible when worn and cannot be detected by any magical-sensing means.

{@b {@i Enact Vengeances.}} As a bonus action, the wearer can cause the ring to show its true form: a shadow curved knife resembling a claw that fits perfectly in the palms of its wearer. This magic dagger lasts until dispelled or if hidden again as a bonus action. It deals 2d8 psychic damage on a hit and has the finesse, and light properties.

item.name: La Paume du Porcelain
entries: An item of pure regality. This gauntlet is composed of chains made from a gold composite alloy, cut sapphires with little cloudiness to them, and an ornate white porcelain dyed into blue flowers as it was formed.
{@b {@i Exalted Touch.}} This item can be used as a spellcasting focus. Any spells that have a range of Touch has a +1 bonus to their spellcasting modifier.
{@b {@i Esoteric Regality.}} Once per long rest, you can cast the spell bigby's hand through this magic item.
